description: &7[ModMenu]&r Press &7[&r&6ALT+M&r&7]&r to open the mod menu, allowing you to change options for mods in the pack.
&7[Iris]&r Press &7[&r&6ALT+I&r&7]&r to configure &3shaders&r, and &7[&r&6I&r&7]&r to toggle them once configured.
&7[Presence Footsteps]&r Press &7[&r&6ALT+P&r&7]&r to adjust the volume or gait of your footsteps, including number of legs.
&7[LambdaBetterGrass]&r You can change whether &3Grass Blocks&r connect vertically from the &3Better Grass&r mod menu.
&7[Charmonium]&r You can adjust the volume of audio ambience from the &3Charmonium&r mod menu.
